## The log-cube transform

\begin{columns}
\begin{column}{0.6\textwidth}
\begin{equation*}
g(t) = C \log^3(t + 1), \; 0 < t \le 365.
\end{equation*}

where $C$ is a normalizing constant:

\begin{equation*}
C = \frac{365}{\log^3(365 + 1)}
\end{equation*}
\end{column}
